Bluebell Therapy

Clinical Supervision for Counselling Professionals

I have a Level 7 qualification in Clinical Supervision, which I gained from the Manchester Institute of Psychotherapy, and offer clinical supervision for both qualified and trainee counsellors and psychotherapists.

My supervisory style is supportive - clinical supervision requires effective collaboration between two professionals, and teamwork and a good working relationship are essential for that. I use the Seven-Eyed Supervison Model to guide my work and am happy to have a free initial discussion with any prospective new supervisees, as I think that it is important that therapists find the right person to work with.

I enjoy working with students as well as qualified therapists and offer concessions for this group, as I acknowledge that they are offering their therapeutic services voluntarily when working in a placement setting.

Please see the contact/prices page for details of fees and student concessions.
